metadata.description: A curated collection of skills, agents, hooks, and commands that provide structured workflows and best practices for Claude Code as a software development assistant. Inspired by obra/superpowers, this plugin enforces TDD, systematic debugging, verification-before-completion, and integrates with beads_viewer for task management.
